eggWeakness.title: Stress reaction
eggWeakness.description: During Surprise attack, Nemesis' Danger token value is reduced by 1 (to min. 1)

nemesisBodyWeakness.title: Endangered species
nemesisBodyWeakness.description: Damage amount required to kill Nemesis is reduced by 1

crewMemberBodyWeakness.title: Mobility
crewMemberBodyWeakness.description: Apart from Queen and Breeders, no other Nemesis can destroy closed doors
